mapper.select: SELECT f1.followingCount followerCount ,f2.followerCount followingCount ,w.wishingCount wishingCount ,c.commentCount commentCount ,b.reviewCount reviewCount FROM (SELECT COUNT(following) followingCount FROM c6_followship WHERE following = #{memberId}) f1, (SELECT COUNT(follower) followerCount FROM c6_followship WHERE follower = #{memberId}) f2, (SELECT COUNT(exhibitionId) wishingCount FROM c6_wishing WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND wished = 'Y') w, (SELECT COUNT(exhibitionId) commentCount FROM c6_comment WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND rating != 0) c, (SELECT COUNT(boardId) reviewCount FROM c6_board WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND category = 'review') b
